name: LendingTree
0:
”Alexa, Ask LendingTree for Current Rates”
”Alexa, Ask LendingTree for Purchase Rates”
”Alexa, Ask LendingTree for Refinance Rates”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lendingtree
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Want to buy a home or refinance? Start with Alexa and LendingTree! Just answer a few questions, and in less than 3 minutes, Alexa can retrieve the best mortgage offer from LendingTree’s huge network of lenders, and send it right to your phone! 

Make banks compete for your business with Alexa and LendingTree!
